I

IAction - Interface in gameengine.model
This interface defines the public methods that each Action subclass will have.
IActor - Interface in gameengine.model
This interface defines a limited subset of Actor functionality.
IAuthoringActor - Interface in authoringenvironment.model
This interface defines the subset of Actor functionality that will be accessible to the game authoring environment.
ICreatorController - Interface in gamedata.controller
The purpose of this interface is to provide the saving capabilities for the authoring environment and game engine to save a game being played or edit to an XML file.
IEditableGameElement - Interface in authoringenvironment.model
Interface for all game elements that can be edited in Game Authoring Environment (actors, levels, and game itself)
IEditingElement - Interface in authoringenvironment.model
 
IEditingEnvironment - Interface in authoringenvironment.model
This class serves as the interface for all editing environments that edit an IEditableGameElement.
IGame - Interface in gameengine.controller
This interface defines the API for the Game class.
IGameController - Interface in gameplayer.controller
This class serves as the public interface that any game controller must implement in order to allow the game data, and game authoring environment to interact with the game player and game engine for the purposes of loading and running the game
IGameScreen - Interface in gameplayer.view
This class serves as the private interface that a Game screen must implement in order to be able to add visual elements of the game to the screen.
IGUI - Interface in gui.view
This interface contains the information that the frontend (of the authoring environment) will pass to the backend (of the authoring environment).
IGUIElement - Interface in gui.view
This interface is part of the internal API.
IHighScoresController - Interface in gamedata.controller
The purpose of this interface is to serve as the public interface with which the ISplashScreen can interact to deal with high scores functionality if the high scores button is pressed.
IHighScoreScreen - Interface in gameplayer.view
This class represents a private interface provides for a screen to display the highest scores recorded for games.
IHUDScreen - Interface in Utilities.HUD
This class serves as the private interface that an HUDScreen must implement to display certain game values stored in the backend (game engine) such as health, scores, etc.
ILevel - Interface in gameengine.controller
This interface describes the API for a Level object Levels will contain sets of Actor objects.
ImageviewActorIcon - Class in authoringenvironment.view
ImageView that serves as an icon for an actor.
ImageviewActorIcon(IAuthoringActor, double) - Constructor for class authoringenvironment.view.ImageviewActorIcon
Construct an icon for a given actor.
init() - Method in class authoringenvironment.controller.Controller
 
init() - Method in class authoringenvironment.view.GUIMain
Initializes resource bundle, controller, and factory class.
init() - Method in class gamedata.controller.FileChooserController
 
init() - Method in class gamedata.view.FileChooserScreen
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.controller.BaseScreenController
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.controller.HighScoreScreenController
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.controller.SplashScreenController
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.view.BaseScreen
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.view.HighScoreScreen
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.view.HUDScreen
 
init() - Method in class gameplayer.view.SplashScreen
 
init() - Method in interface gui.controller.IScreenController
 
init() - Method in class gui.view.Screen
Will instantiate the basic components of a visualized screen.
init() - Method in class Utilities.HUD.HUDScreen
 
init() - Method in class Utilities.HUD.Window
 
initCurrentActors() - Method in class gameengine.controller.Game
Initializes the current actors
initHUDData() - Method in class gameengine.controller.Game
Initializes the HUDData
initialize(int) - Method in class gameplayer.controller.GameController
Will initialize the backend (game engine) with the current level's information and actor information to set up the game for playing.
initialize() - Method in class gameplayer.view.HighScoreScreen
 
initialize() - Method in interface gameplayer.view.IHighScoreScreen
Creates the scene with with current scores saved in the game score xml data
initializeEnvironment() - Method in class authoringenvironment.view.GUIMainScreen
Initializes the Main Screen's GUI Elements
initTimeline() - Method in class gameengine.controller.Game
Initializes a timeline that will be used for the game loop
IParserController - Interface in gamedata.controller
The purpose of this interface is to provide the loading capabilities from the authoring environment and game engine to play or edit a game from an XML file.
IRule - Interface in gameengine.model
This interface defines the public methods for Rule objects.
IScreen - Interface in gui.view
 
IScreenController - Interface in gui.controller
 
isDead() - Method in class gameengine.model.Actor
Marks the Actor as dead
isInAir() - Method in class gameengine.model.Actor
 
isMain() - Method in interface authoringenvironment.model.IAuthoringActor
Return whether the actor is a playable, main character.
isMain() - Method in class gameengine.model.Actor
Return whether the actor is a playable, main character.
ISplashScreen - Interface in gameplayer.view
This class serves as the private interface that a Game must implement in order to be able to provide functionality for the buttons that will be on the splash screen first displayed to a user.
ITrigger - Interface in gameengine.model
This interface defines the public methods for Trigger objects.
